title: Steeley
author: Steeley
created_time: May 21, 2022, 10:51:16 PMLast edit: May 22, 2022, 05:59:07 PM by Steeley
content: FREE RAFFLE CELEBRATING PIZZA DAY - Three winners - Sign up fast this ends tomorrow on May 22 10:00 PM Eastern50 Slots - Anyone can sign up by selecting a number in the comments. Winning numbers already selected and sent to two trusted members via privnote that can verify the numbers were selected previous to anyone signing. They are refraining from participating. Free shipping for N.America. Probably free internationally but we may need to negotiate that depending on where you are. If an unfilled slot is selected, then another number will be substituted (10 total number have been generated). Top winner chooses what he or she wants out of these three items, then winner number 2 selects, then the final winner receives the last item by default:Raffled items: 1. Be your own bank, Hope and Despair set, un-numbered 2. 2019 Moonbit 1 M BTX load Pink Sticker and Titan finish 3. Red Aluminum Casascious & a 2021 Shibe Mint Copper Doge Coin Â  Â #1 Â heisty#2 Â CryptoGreatDane#3 Â turbodogma#4 Â  DirtyBirdE#5 Â  5tift#6 Â  almond#7 Â  Krogoth#8 Â  GazetaBitcoin#9 Â  PreciousMetapsICT#10 Â The-Crypto-Kid#11 Â Yoda#12 Â sweeteye#13 Â 2stout#14 Â owlcatz#15 Â justdlisk#16 Â Remsjack#17 Â HeRetiK#18 Â Otillo#19 Â NeuroticFish#20 Â ChiBitCTy#21 Â PeakDK#22 Â Real-Duke#23 Â Fattcat#24 Â slimzak#25 Â Willi9974#26 Â MrMojoRising#27 Â tldr-hodl#28 Â Darker45#29 Â Dustin westerbeck#30 Â thiago007#31 Â Debutant#32 Â inthelongrun#33 Â Hookzup1#34 Â Boristhecat#35 Â Mbitr#36 Â JanEmil#37 Â doblezero#38 Â haloxon#39 Â Suzuki Matt#40 Â shasan#41 Â DireWolfM14#42 Â tweetious#43 Â cygan#44 Â bitbollo#45 Â Jcga#46 Â dolbleU#47 Â Denoste#48 Â Koal84#49 Â geophphreigh#50 Â aoluainGood luck and happy Bitcoin pizza day!SteeleyWINNER #1 - 16 RemsjackWINNER #2 - 7 KrogothWINNER #3 - 50 aolainRemsjack selects which item?
